physics3d
Class Sphere

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--physics3d.Sphere
All Implemented Interfaces:
Physics3dObject
public final class Sphere
extends java.lang.Object
implements Physics3dObject

Sphere is an immutable ADT which represents a sphere in 3-space
